name: BattleBay!
description:
What Is BattleBay?

A fast paced one versus one, stylised, vibrant, third person shooter with bouncing, physic based projectiles. In conjunction with this mechanic; the middle line of the ‘dodgeball court’ moves with the flow of the game. Whoever controls the whole court before time is up, wins!

Meet The Team!

Project Manager / Technical Artist -- James Holt. (BLOG) Explore my socials here!

Lead Artist -- Harrison Snatt. (BLOG) Visit my Artstation!

Programmer/ Artist -- Abbie Hipwell. (BLOG) See more of my work on my Artstation!

3D Artist/ Animator -- Owen McNally. (BLOG) Find my socials here!

Programmer -- Jade Taylor. (BLOG) For more of my work, look here!
